lead_paragraph: KASTENBAUM--Sydelle. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Sydelle Kastenbaum, who leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Sydelle's beloved children, Fred (Karen) and Donald (Cindie); her grandchildren, Julie, Harry, Frankie, and Daniel; her great-grandson, Roman; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
